message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for sale. I believe it would be highly beneficial to you. I'm asking for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but my asking price reflects the true value of this product. I could meet you halfway - how about $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
